title: Subpart  - Client-Lawyer Relationship
content:
Subpart  - Client-Lawyer Relationship

State Regulations
§ 1200.1.1 - Competence
§ 1200.1.2 - Scope of representation and allocation of authority between client and lawyer
§ 1200.1.3 - Diligence
§ 1200.1.4 - Communication
§ 1200.1.5 - Fees and division of fees
§ 1200.1.6 - Confidentiality of information
§ 1200.1.7 - Conflict of interest: current clients
§ 1200.1.8 - Current clients: specific conflict of interest rules
§ 1200.1.9 - Duties to former clients
§ 1200.1.10 - Imputation of conflicts of interest
§ 1200.1.11 - Special conflicts of interest for former and current government officers and employees
§ 1200.1.12 - Specific conflicts of interest for former judges, arbitrators, mediators or other third-party neutrals
§ 1200.1.13 - Organization as client
§ 1200.1.14 - Client with diminished capacity
§ 1200.1.15 - Preserving identity of funds and property of others; fiduciary responsibility; commingling and misappropriation of client funds or property; maintenance of bank accounts; record keeping; examination of records
§ 1200.1.16 - Declining or terminating representation
§ 1200.1.17 - Sale of law practice
§ 1200.1.18 - Duties to prospective clients

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
